com.linecorp.armeria.server.throttling

Class ThrottlingStrategy<T extends Request>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.throttling.ThrottlingStrategy<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircuitBreakerThrottlingStrategy, RateLimitingThrottlingStrategy

    public abstract class ThrottlingStrategy<T extends Request>
extends Object
    Determines whether a request should be throttled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ThrottlingStrategy()
      Creates a new anonymous ThrottlingStrategy.
      protected ThrottlingStrategy(String name)
      Creates a new ThrottlingStrategy with specified name.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract CompletableFuture<Boolean> accept(ServiceRequestContext ctx, T request)
      Returns whether a given request should be treated as failed before it is handled actually.

      Returns a singleton ThrottlingStrategy that always accepts requests.

      Returns the name of this ThrottlingStrategy.
